results.idea: Short-volume share: ratio of short volume to total volume (BATS)
results.description: Uses both shrt43_batsshvol_svol and shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume to capture shorting intensity on BATS. Applied SUGGESTION1 (multiple datafields). These fields have coverage=1.0 so ts_backfill not needed (SUGGESTION3 not applied). UserCount/alphaCount are high (69/102 for totalvolume), satisfying SUGGESTION4. Simple ratio is robust; confidence set to 0.65 because short-share often signals pressure but can be noisy.

Momentum of short-share: ts_returns of ratio over 5 days. Used two fields (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high so no ts_backfill. Relies on established momentum of shorting flows; confidence 0.6. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (fields not vector).

Cross-sectional zscore of short-share to capture relative extremes. Uses both svol and totalvolume (SUGGESTION1). High coverage and user counts; no ts_backfill. Zscore reduces outliers. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short flow surprise: short-share minus 20d mean (BATS)
results.description: Compute ts_av_diff between current short-share and its 20d mean to detect sudden increases. Multiple datafields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage fine; no backfill. Confidence 0.66.

Assume sumsize_s_data1 is a vector of trade sizes; applied SUGGESTION2 to use vec_avg(shrt43_batssh_sumsize_s_data1). Also use totalvolume to scale. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1.0; no backfill. Confidence 0.55 due to vector assumption.

ts_returns of vec_sum(sumsize_s_data2) over 10 days to detect growing short trade sizes. SUGGESTION2 used to aggregate vector. Coverage=1.0 so no backfill. UserCount moderate; confidence 0.5 (speculative).

results.idea: Short-share / marketcenter total volume (BATS center share)
results.description: Ratio of BATS short volume to marketcenter totalvolume to detect exchange-specific accumulation. Uses two fields (SUGGESTION1). Both coverage=1.0. Confidence 0.6 due to exchange microstructure signal.
Short-share acceleration measured as ts_delta over 3 days. Uses ratio of two fields (SUGGESTION1). No backfill required. Confidence 0.58.
zscore of shrt43_batsshvol_svol scaled by inverse totalvolume to emphasize small-liquidity stocks. Uses two fields (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Cross-exchange short-share divergence: BATS vs EDGX
results.description: Difference in short-share between BATS and EDGX: subtract(BATS ratio, EDGX ratio). Uses four underlying fields but only two ratios combined (still two inputs). Applied SUGGESTION1. Coverage high. Confidence 0.6.
ts_returns of EDGX short-share over 10 days. Single ratio from two fields (SUGGESTION1). High user/alpha counts on EDGX totalvolume (45/91) used (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.64.
zscore of EDGX short-share to detect relative shorting. Uses two fields. Covered fully; no backfill. Confidence 0.66.
ts_av_diff of EDGX short-share over 30 days. Multiple fields used (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: EDGX short-volume concentration: vec_stddev of sumsize_s
results.description: Assumes sumsize_s_data1 is vector; use vec_stddev to measure concentration of short trades. SUGGESTION2 applied. Then normalize by totalvolume. Coverage ~1.0. Confidence 0.52.
Use vec_max on sumsize_m_data2 to find large short-sale sizes intraday. SUGGESTION2 applied. Coverage ~0.9855 so no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.48 (more exploratory).
ts_corr between short-share and vec_avg(sumsize_s_data1) over 20d to see if large sizes drive share. SUGGESTION1+2 used. Coverage high. Confidence 0.6.
Basic ratio divide(shrt43_byxxshvol_svol, shrt43_byxxshvol_totalvolume). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage 1.0 on these fields. UserCount moderate; confidence 0.58.
ts_returns of BYXX short-share over 7 days. Uses two fields. Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence 0.56.
quantile of BYXX short-share to spread tails (SUGGESTION1). Coverage 1.0 so no backfill. Confidence 0.6.

vec_avg of sumsize_m_data1 divided by totalvolume to capture average sell size vs liquidity. SUGGESTION2+1 used. Coverage of sumsize_m_data1=0.9277 (<1 but >0.6) so ts_backfill not applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.5.
divide(shrt43_edgashvol_svol, shrt43_edgashvol_totalvolume). Simple baseline for EDGASH. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage 1.0; confidence 0.57.
ts_zscore of EDGASH short-share over 20 days to reduce outliers. Uses two fields. Coverage high. Confidence 0.6.
ts_arg_min on EDGASH short-share over 10d to find recent minima (short-covering). Two fields used. Confidence 0.55.
Subtract BATS ratio minus BYXX ratio to capture exchange-specific shorting pressure. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage high. Confidence 0.58.
Average short-share across EDGX and BATS using add() then divide by 2. Uses multiple fields (SUGGESTION1). Keeps operator count low. Confidence 0.6.
Compute max-min across exchange ratios to capture dispersion. Uses vec_max/vec_min style but implemented with max/min of two inputs. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
results.implementation: subtract(max(divide(shrt43_batsshvol_svol, shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume), divide(shrt43_edgxshvol_svol, shrt43_edgxshvol_totalvolume)), min(divide(shrt43_batsshvol_svol, shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume), divide(shrt43_edgxshvol_svol, shrt43_edgxshvol_totalvolume)))

results.description: ts_ir(divide(svol,totalvolume),30) to get mean/std signal strength. Uses two fields. High coverage; SUGGESTION4 used indirectly. Confidence 0.63.
if_else of ts_returns < 0 to isolate falling short-share regimes: trade_when style logic via if_else(signal, ts_returns, 0). Uses two fields. Confidence 0.49.
vec_avg(sumsize_s)/svol to capture average short trade size relative to short volume. SUGGESTION2 and SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage good. Confidence 0.53.

Divide marketcenter totalvolume by totalvolume to find center concentration of activity. Uses two fields: shrt43_batsshvol_marketcenter and shrt43_batsshvol_totalvolume. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.
vec_range of sumsize_s_data1 divided by totalvolume to capture intraday size swings. SUGGESTION2 used. Coverage ~1.0. Confidence 0.5.
ts_arg_max of short-share over 15d to detect recent peaks (potential reversals). Two fields used. Confidence 0.52.
ts_quantile of short-share over 30d to normalize time-series rank to Gaussian quantiles. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
subtract(current short-share, ts_mean(short-share,10)) to find deviations. Uses two fields. Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.6.
ts_std_dev of short-share over 20d as a risk/signal metric. Uses two fields. Coverage high. Confidence 0.57.
Winsorize short-share to mitigate outliers, then scale by inverse liquidity. Uses two fields and winsorize operator. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
vec_count on sumsize_s_data1 as proxy for number of short trades, normalized by totalvolume. SUGGESTION2 applied. Coverage good. Confidence 0.46.
ts_corr between short-share and totalvolume over 20d to detect demand-driven shorts. Uses two fields. Confidence 0.55.
ts_zscore of 5d returns of short-share to spot significant shorting momentum. Uses two fields. Confidence 0.61.

results.description: Ratio of BATS short-share to EDGASH short-share to capture relative build-up. Uses two field ratios combined as divide(). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

Use ts_ir over 30d; negative IR suggests mean-reversion of short-share (opportunity). Uses two fields. Confidence 0.53.
normalize(divide(svol,totalvolume)) then quantile to get stable cross-sectional scores. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Short-share tail clipping: tail to zero extreme tiny values
results.description: Apply tail to set tiny short-share values to zero to reduce noise, then zscore. Uses two fields and tail operator. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.
ts_rank of short-share over 10d to capture recent relative position. Uses two fields. Coverage high. Confidence 0.54.
Compute kurtosis of daily average short sizes to detect heavy-tail shorting. SUGGESTION2 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Short-volume product spike: ts_product of short-share over 5d
results.description: ts_product captures persistent shorting over 5 days. Uses ratio so two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.
ts_decay_linear of short-share 10d to emphasize recent flow while smoothing. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.
vec_avg(sumsize_s_data1) divided by marketcenter volume to detect relative blockiness on center. SUGGESTION2+1 used. Confidence 0.47.

ts_max_diff(short-share,30) provides distance from 30d high (short-covering signal). Uses two fields. Confidence 0.56.

vec_stddev(sumsize_s_data1) divided by vec_avg(sumsize_s_data1) to measure dispersion relative to mean. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Short-size max over last day relative to yesterday (ts_delay)

winsorize then zscore of short-share to reduce influence of outliers; uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply ts_step(1) with short-share to incorporate day count pattern; uses two fields but keeps operators few. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.3 (exploratory).

results.idea: Short-share relative rank normalized across groups via quantile

Use ts_target_tvr_decay to smooth short-share targeting turnover; uses short-share ratio. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.
Measure imbalance across intraday sizes. SUGGESTION2 applied. Uses only one vector field per KEEP_IN_MIND2. Confidence 0.42.
Bucket zscore(divide(svol,totalvolume)) into tails for trading thresholds. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.description: ts_arg_max over 5d on short-share to detect immediate peaks. Uses two fields. Confidence 0.5.

last_diff_value to find prior different average size within 10d indicating change. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.39.
